name: RDM Goal Accountability Agent
description: AI-powered goal-setting and accountability system with token-based commitment. Features two specialized agents: (1) Goal-Setting & Pledge Management Agent for SDG/ESG-aligned goal creation, RDM token pledge management, and daily/weekly reflection facilitation, and (2) Veritas - an impartial AI judge for evidence-based verification, outcome determination, and fair token distribution between Reward and Remorse buckets. Supports multiple verification methods including self-reporting, third-party apps, IoT devices, and peer validation. Calculates environmental/social impact metrics and awards achievement badges.
example_output: Goal: Reduce single-use plastic by 80% in 30 days | Pledge: 100 RDM tokens | Verification: Photo log + peer validation | Outcome: 85% completion (SUCCESS) | Distribution: 100 RDM to Reward bucket + 5 bonus tokens | Impact Badge: Sustainability Hero (Gold) | Environmental Impact: 12.5kg plastic diverted, 18.75kg CO2 saved | Smart Contract: 0xABC123... | SDG Alignment: SDG 12 (Responsible Consumption)

other: AI agent judgments are algorithmic assessments based on provided evidence and predefined criteria. Users maintain ultimate responsibility for their goals and outcomes. Token distributions are final once executed on-chain. For disputes, refer to the Masumi dispute resolution process.

agent_1.name: Goal-Setting & Pledge Management Specialist
functions: Guide goal selection based on SDGs, ESGs, personal values
Capture and validate RDM token pledges (75-175 tokens)

agent_2.name: Veritas - Final Judgment & Token Distribution
functions: Award bonus tokens for exceptional efforts

token_distribution_rules.SUCCESS: 100% to Reward Bucket, 0% to Remorse Bucket
token_distribution_rules.FAILURE: 0% to Reward Bucket, 100% to Remorse Bucket
